review: its soooo great and easy to work! im so happy i got it
author: kim henderson

review: As good as advertised. Great quality, simplicity of use, endless options!
author: Andrew H Goh

review: This thing is so awesome!!!!!!!!!!  A must buy!!! And it's cheap!!!
author: David Duane Conley Jr.

review: The Fire Stick functions, but I find the Prime programming lacking. I was expecting more depth and breath of content.
author: B F Mason Jr

review: I'm a big fan of Prime and Amazon. But, after a week, the fire stick has proved pretty useless. It doesn't connect to a verified network - constantly failing and asking for the password. It also freezes constantly. I was really excited about streaming new content but I'd rather go back to my TV's apps than hurdle this thing. It also requires a a power source plugged into it which, is just kinda lame.
author: Nasca
